GSP30spandkau:2: yatra sthitam idaṃ sarvaṃ kāryaṃ yasmāc ca nirgataṃ |
GSP30spandkau:6: ahaṃ sukhī ca duḥkhī ca raktaś ca ityadisamvidaḥ |
GSP30spandkau:8: na duḥkhaṃ na sukhaṃ yatra na grāhyam grāhakaṃ na ca |
GSP30spandkau:9: na cāsti mūḍhabhāvo 'pi tad asti paramārthataḥ || 5 ||
GSP30spandkau:15: api tv ātmabalasparśāt puruṣas tatsamo bhavet || 8 ||
GSP30spandkau:17: yadā kṣobhaḥ pralīyeta tadā syāt paramam padam || 9 ||
GSP30spandkau:19: yatas tadepsitaṃ sarvaṃ jānāti ca karoti ca || 10 ||
GSP30spandkau:21: smayamāna ivāste yas tasyeyaṃ kusṛtiḥ kutaḥ || 11 ||
GSP30spandkau:22: nābhāvo bhāvyatām eti na ca tatrāsty amūḍhatā |
GSP30spandkau:25: na tv evaṃ smaryamāṇatvaṃ tat tattvam pratipadyate || 13 ||
GSP30spandkau:27: kāryatā kṣayiṇī tatra kartṛtvam punar akṣayam || 14 ||
GSP30spandkau:28: kāryonmukhaḥ prayatno yaḥ kevalaṃ so 'tra lupyate |
GSP30spandkau:33: nityaṃ syāt suprabuddhasya tadādyante parasya tu || 17 ||
GSP30spandkau:35: padadvaye vibhur bhāti tadanyatra tu cinmayaḥ || 18 ||
GSP30spandkau:42: atikruddhaḥ prahṛṣṭo vā kiṃ karomīti vā mṛśan |
GSP30spandkau:43: dhāvan va yat padaṃ gacchet tatra spandaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ || 22 ||
GSP30spandkau:44: yām avasthāṃ samālambya yad ayam mama vakṣyati |
GSP30spandkau:50: dvitīyo niḥṣyandaḥ tadākramya balam mantrāḥ sarvajñābalaśālinaḥ |
GSP30spandkau:56: tasmāc chabdārthacintāsu na sāvasthā na yā śivaḥ |
GSP30spandkau:58: iti vā yasya saṃvittiḥ krīḍātvenākhilaṃ jagat |
GSP30spandkau:59: sa paśyan satataṃ yukto jīvanmukto na saṃśayaḥ || 5 ||
GSP30spandkau:64: tṛtīyo niḥṣyandaḥ yathecchābhyarthito dhātā jāgrato 'rthān hṛdi sthitān somasūryodayaṃ kṛtvā sampādayati dehinaḥ || 1 |
GSP30spandkau:67: anyathā tu svatantrā syāt sṛṣṭis taddharmakatvataḥ |
GSP30spandkau:69: yathā hi artho 'sphuṭo dṛṣṭaḥ sāvadhāne 'pi cetasi |
GSP30spandkau:71: tathā yat paramārthena yena yatra yathā sthitam |
GSP30spandkau:72: tat tathā balam ākramya na cirāt sampravartate || 5 ||
GSP30spandkau:74: ācchādayed bubhukṣāṃ ca tathā yo 'ti bubhukṣitaḥ || 6 ||
GSP30spandkau:78: tad unmeṣaviluptaṃ cet kutaḥ sā syād ahetukā || 8 ||
GSP30spandkau:80: unmeṣaḥ sa tu vijñeyaḥ svayaṃ tam upalakṣayet || 9 ||
GSP30spandkau:81: ato bindur ato nādo rūpam asmād ato rasaḥ |
GSP30spandkau:84: tadā kiṃ bahunoktena svayam eva avabhotsyate || 11 ||
GSP30spandkau:88: kalāviluptavibhavo gataḥ san sa paśuḥ smṛtaḥ || 13 ||
GSP30spandkau:97: bhuṅkte paravaśo bhogaṃ tadbhāvāt saṃsared ataḥ |
GSP30spandkau:99: yadā tv ekatra saṃrūḍhas tadā tasya layodayau |
GSP30spandkau:100: niyacchan bhoktṛtām eti tataś cakreśvaro bhavet || 19 ||
GSP30spandkau:104: vasuguptavac chivāya hi bhavati sadā sarvalokasya || 2 ||
